synopsis.text:
Minato Narumiya, once a passionate practitioner of Kyudo, the traditional Japanese martial art of archery, finds himself rekindling his love for the sport in high school. Following a devastating event during his middle school tournament, Minato had distanced himself from Kyudo. However, the persistent encouragement from his childhood friends, Seiya Takehaya and Ryouhei Yamanouchi, propels him back into the world of archery.

Joining the school's Kyudo club, Minato embarks on a journey to overcome his deep-seated fear of aiming the bow. Together with his friends, he sets his sights on winning the local tournament. This feature-length sports anime film not only recaps Minato's journey but also presents new scenes, offering a fresh perspective on his inspiring story. Prepare to be captivated by the tale of friendship, resilience, and the pursuit of passion in the face of adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
